venue.address_1: 212 Hampshire St., 212 Hampshire St., Inman Sq., Cambridge
venue.name: Ryles Jazz Club

item.description:
From Ryles web site:
During his 2011 European journey, Matias (Mingo) German, conceived the idea of experimenting with musical styles like jazz, klezmer, and personal original melodies, fusing them with Afro-Argentinian sound colors & rhythmic feels for dancing like tango, milonga, candombe, chacarera, zamba, chamamé, huayno, landó, festejo, etc.

Mingo has reached out to a superb group of international musicians to make his musical dream a reality: Rebecca Kleinmann (flute), John Stein (guitar), Evan Harlan (accordion), John Lockwood (acoustic bass), Matias Mingote German (drums).

The rich stew these musicians are cooking is spiced with their unique musical personalities and the whole is a vibrant tapestry that exemplifies the best meaning of the term "world music."During his 2011 European journey, Matias (Mingo) German, conceived the idea of experimenting with musical styles like jazz, klezmer, and personal original melodies, fusing them with Afro-Argentinian sound colors & rhythmic feels for dancing like tango, milonga, candombe, chacarera, zamba, chamamé, huayno, landó, festejo, etc.
item.name: Mingotan Project
